title: Life in Ancient Rome
creator_credit: William Deneen and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Recreates typical scenes in Rome during the reign of Emperor Trajan. Examines characteristics and achievements of the Roman Empire at the height of its power. Discusses weaknesses in Roman society and the ways in which Roman ideas and culture influenced the development of Western civilisation. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
